items.sentence: I have the impression that he knows the secret.
People don\'t like what they can\'t understand.
It seemed that there was no one in the village.
It was the best thing that ever happened to me.
It was very different from what I had imagined.
It would be a waste of time to ask Tom to help.
It\'ll be difficult to convince Tom to do that.
It\'ll be pretty hard to raise that much money.
It\'ll take me a long time to get over my cold.
The audience clapped when the concert was over.
